metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Microsoft Purview data connector with template
Microsoft Purview data connector with template version 2.0.7

connectorUiConfig.title: Microsoft Purview (Preview)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Connect to Microsoft Purview to enable data sensitivity enrichment of Microsoft Sentinel. Data classification and sensitivity label logs from Microsoft Purview scans can be ingested and visualized through workbooks, analytical rules, and more. For more information, see the [Microsoft Sentinel documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2224125&wt.mc_id=sentinel_dataconnectordocs_content_cnl_csasci).

sampleQueries.description: View files that contain a specific classification (example shows Social Security Number)
sampleQueries.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
 | where Classification has "Social Security Number"

dataTypes.name: AzureDiagnostics (PurviewDataSensitivityLogs)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Microsoft Purview account Owner or Contributor role to set up Diagnostic Settings. Microsoft Contributor role with write permissions to enable data connector, view workbook, and create analytic rules.

instructionSteps.description:
Within the Azure Portal, navigate to your Purview resource:
 1. In the search bar, search for **Purview accounts.**
 2. Select the specific account that you would like to be set up with Sentinel.

Inside your Microsoft Purview resource:
 3. Select **Diagnostic Settings.**
 4. Select **+ Add diagnostic setting.**
 5. In the **Diagnostic setting** blade:
   - Select the Log Category as **DataSensitivityLogEvent**.
   - Select **Send to Log Analytics**.
   - Chose the log destination workspace. This should be the same workspace that is used by **Microsoft Sentinel.**
  - Click **Save**.
instructionSteps.title: Connect Microsoft Purview to Microsoft Sentinel

connectorUiConfig.title: Microsoft Purview (Preview)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Connect to Microsoft Purview to enable data sensitivity enrichment of Microsoft Sentinel. Data classification and sensitivity label logs from Microsoft Purview scans can be ingested and visualized through workbooks, analytical rules, and more. For more information, see the [Microsoft Sentinel documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2224125&wt.mc_id=sentinel_dataconnectordocs_content_cnl_csasci).

dataTypes.name: AzureDiagnostics (PurviewDataSensitivityLogs)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

sampleQueries.description: View files that contain a specific classification (example shows Social Security Number)
sampleQueries.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
 | where Classification has "Social Security Number"

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Microsoft Purview account Owner or Contributor role to set up Diagnostic Settings. Microsoft Contributor role with write permissions to enable data connector, view workbook, and create analytic rules.

instructionSteps.description:
Within the Azure Portal, navigate to your Purview resource:
 1. In the search bar, search for **Purview accounts.**
 2. Select the specific account that you would like to be set up with Sentinel.

Inside your Microsoft Purview resource:
 3. Select **Diagnostic Settings.**
 4. Select **+ Add diagnostic setting.**
 5. In the **Diagnostic setting** blade:
   - Select the Log Category as **DataSensitivityLogEvent**.
   - Select **Send to Log Analytics**.
   - Chose the log destination workspace. This should be the same workspace that is used by **Microsoft Sentinel.**
  - Click **Save**.
instructionSteps.title: Connect Microsoft Purview to Microsoft Sentinel

10","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"__Sensitivity Labels__ Sensitivity Labels let you classify your organization's data in order to highlight which resources contain properties.description: @{workbookKey=sentinel-MicrosoftPurview; logoFileName=MicrosoftPurview.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Microsoft Purview; templateRelativePath=MicrosoftPurview.json; subtitle=; provider=Microsoft}.description
Microsoft Purview Analytics Rule 1 with template
Identifies all classifications that have been detected on assets during a scan by Microsoft Purview within the last 24 hours.
properties.displayName: Sensitive Data Discovered in the Last 24 Hours
properties.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where Classification != "[]" 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Within the last 24 hours, Microsoft Purview scanned assets that contained classifications. The classifications discovered include {{Classification}}.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Sensitive Data Discovered in the Last 24 Hours by Microsoft Purview

properties.description: Microsoft Purview Analytics Rule 2 with template

Customized query used to identify specific classifications and parameters that have been discovered on assets in the last 24 hours by Microsoft Purview. By default, the query identifies Social Security Numbers detected, but the specific classification monitored along with other data fields can be adjusted. A list of supported Microsoft Purview classifications can be found here: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/purview/supported-classifications
properties.displayName: Sensitive Data Discovered in the Last 24 Hours - Customized

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Within the last 24 hours, Microsoft Purview scanned assets that contained classifications. The classifications discovered include {{Classification}}.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Sensitive Data Discovered in the Last 24 Hours by Microsoft Purview
